channel.title: papers on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in papers on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current research consists of: Unbiased mixed variables distance (van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C.) - Under review - arXiv - SSRN Convex Clustering of Mixed Numerical and Categorical Data (Brink, T. and Cavicchia, C.) Sparse Scaling (Groenen, P.J.F. and Cavicchia, C.) KNN for mixed data (van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C.

item.title: publications
item.description: refereed journal articles Willemsen, R., Cavicchia, C., van den Heuvel, W. and van de Velden, M. An Exact Solution Approach for Hierarchical Clustering INFORMS Journal on Computing, (2025), Bottazzi Schenone, M., Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G. Ultrametric Factor Analysis for building hierarchies of reliable and unidimensional latent concepts Psychometrika, (2025) van de Velden, M., Iodice D’Enza, A., Markos, A. and Cavicchia, C.
